zsmul_hom:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
@[simp]
theorem zsmul_hom [preadditive C] {P Q : karoubi C} (n : ℤ) (f : «expr ⟶ » P Q) : («expr • » n f).f = «expr • » n f.f :=
  map_zsmul (inclusion_hom P Q) n f
#align zsmul_hom zsmul_hom
sum_hom:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
@[simp]
theorem sum_hom [preadditive C] {P Q : karoubi C} {α : Type _} (s : Finset α) (f : α → «expr ⟶ » P Q) :
    (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (f x)).f =
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (f x).f :=
  add_monoid_hom.map_sum (inclusion_hom P Q) f s
#align sum_hom sum_hom
p_comp:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem p_comp {P Q : karoubi C} (f : hom P Q) : «expr ≫ » P.p f.f = f.f := by rw [f.comm, ← assoc, P.idem]
#align p_comp p_comp
p_comm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem p_comm {P Q : karoubi C} (f : hom P Q) : «expr ≫ » P.p f.f = «expr ≫ » f.f Q.p := by rw [p_comp, comp_p]
#align p_comm p_comm
id_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
#print id_eq /-
@[simp]
theorem id_eq {P : karoubi C} : («expr𝟙») P = ⟨P.p, by repeat' rw [P.idem]⟩ := by rfl
#align id_eq id_eq
-/
hom_ext:
@[simp]
theorem hom_ext {P Q : karoubi C} {f g : hom P Q} : f = g ↔ f.f = g.f :=
  by
  constructor
  · intro h
    rw [h]
  · ext
#align hom_ext hom_ext
hom_eq_zero_iff:
theorem hom_eq_zero_iff [preadditive C] {P Q : karoubi C} {f : hom P Q} : f = 0 ↔ f.f = 0 :=
  hom_ext
#align hom_eq_zero_iff hom_eq_zero_iff
ext:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Joël Riou. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Joël Riou
-/
@[ext]
theorem ext {P Q : karoubi C} (h_X : P.X = Q.X) (h_p : «expr ≫ » P.p (eq_to_hom h_X) = «expr ≫ » (eq_to_hom h_X) Q.p) :
    P = Q := by
  cases P
  cases Q
  dsimp at h_X h_p
  subst h_X
  simpa only [true_and_iff, eq_self_iff_true, id_comp, eq_to_hom_refl, heq_iff_eq, comp_id] using h_p
#align ext ext
eq_to_hom_f:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp]
theorem eq_to_hom_f {P Q : karoubi C} (h : P = Q) :
    karoubi.hom.f (eq_to_hom h) = «expr ≫ » P.p (eq_to_hom (congr_arg karoubi.X h)) :=
  by
  subst h
  simp only [eq_to_hom_refl, karoubi.id_eq, comp_id]
#align eq_to_hom_f eq_to_hom_f
decomp_p:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem decomp_p (P : karoubi C) : (to_karoubi C).map P.p = «expr ≫ » (decomp_id_p P) (decomp_id_i P) :=
  by
  ext
  simp only [comp_f, decomp_id_p_f, decomp_id_i_f, P.idem, to_karoubi_map_f]
#align decomp_p decomp_p
decomp_id_p_to_karoubi:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
theorem decomp_id_p_to_karoubi (X : C) : decomp_id_p ((to_karoubi C).obj X) = («expr𝟙») _ :=
  by
  ext
  rfl
#align decomp_id_p_to_karoubi decomp_id_p_to_karoubi
decomp_id_p_naturality:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem decomp_id_p_naturality {P Q : karoubi C} (f : «expr ⟶ » P Q) :
    «expr ≫ » (decomp_id_p P) f =
      «expr ≫ » (⟨f.f, by erw [comp_id, id_comp]⟩ : «expr ⟶ » (P.X : karoubi C) Q.X) (decomp_id_p Q) :=
  by
  ext
  simp only [comp_f, decomp_id_p_f, karoubi.comp_p, karoubi.p_comp]
#align decomp_id_p_naturality decomp_id_p_naturality
decomp_id_i_to_karoubi:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
theorem decomp_id_i_to_karoubi (X : C) : decomp_id_i ((to_karoubi C).obj X) = («expr𝟙») _ :=
  by
  ext
  rfl
#align decomp_id_i_to_karoubi decomp_id_i_to_karoubi
decomp_id_i_naturality:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem decomp_id_i_naturality {P Q : karoubi C} (f : «expr ⟶ » P Q) :
    «expr ≫ » f (decomp_id_i _) = «expr ≫ » (decomp_id_i _) ⟨f.f, by erw [comp_id, id_comp]⟩ :=
  by
  ext
  simp only [comp_f, decomp_id_i_f, karoubi.comp_p, karoubi.p_comp]
#align decomp_id_i_naturality decomp_id_i_naturality
decomp_id:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-- The formal direct factor of `P.X` given by the idempotent `P.p` in the category `C`
is actually a direct factor in the category `karoubi C`. -/
theorem decomp_id (P : karoubi C) : («expr𝟙») P = «expr ≫ » (decomp_id_i P) (decomp_id_p P) :=
  by
  ext
  simp only [comp_f, id_eq, P.idem, decomp_id_i, decomp_id_p]
#align decomp_id decomp_id
comp_proof:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem comp_proof {P Q R : karoubi C} (g : hom Q R) (f : hom P Q) :
    «expr ≫ » f.f g.f = «expr ≫ » P.p («expr ≫ » («expr ≫ » f.f g.f) R.p) := by rw [assoc, comp_p, ← assoc, p_comp]
#align comp_proof comp_proof
comp_p:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp, reassoc.1]
theorem comp_p {P Q : karoubi C} (f : hom P Q) : «expr ≫ » f.f Q.p = f.f := by rw [f.comm, assoc, assoc, Q.idem]
#align comp_p comp_p
comp_f:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
@[simp]
theorem comp_f {P Q R : karoubi C} (f : «expr ⟶ » P Q) (g : «expr ⟶ » Q R) : («expr ≫ » f g).f = «expr ≫ » f.f g.f := by
  rfl
#align comp_f comp_f
coe_p:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
@[simp]
theorem coe_p (X : C) : (X : karoubi C).p = («expr𝟙») X := by rfl
#align coe_p coe_p
coe_X:
@[simp]
theorem coe_X (X : C) : (X : karoubi C).X = X := by rfl
#align coe_X coe_X
